Global

Type Definitions

OTRParams

Optional OTR Session parameters.
Type:
  • Object
Properties:
Name Type Description
policy number POLICY default is otr.POLICY.DEFAULT
secret string shared secret to use during SMP authentication if not specified as argument in smp methods.
MTU number max message fragment size in bytes, default is 0 which means no fragmentation.
Source:
  • otr.js, line 1097

PrivKey

An OTR key is a DSA key. This object stores the values of the components that make up the private and public key. It is provided as a means to easily export and import a key into an Account. It is returned in the callback supplied to generateKey method and returned by the exportKey method of an Account instance.
Type:
  • Object
Properties:
Name Type Description
p string p
q string q
g string g
y string y
x string x
Source:
  • otr.js, line 602
